entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness this evening then periods of snow beginning near midnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming south 20 after midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of snow changing to rain or snow and ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High 6. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 8. POP 30%
